name: Bay Area Crisis Nursery - Emergency Childcare
description: FREE emergency childcare for children birth-6; up to 30 days per 6 months, 60 days per year
fullDescription: Bay Area Crisis Nursery provides free emergency childcare for families in crisis, offering a safe, nurturing environment for young children while parents address urgent situations.
whatTheyOffer:
- FREE emergency childcare
- For children birth to age 6
- Up to 30 days per 6 months
- Maximum 60 days per year
- Safe, nurturing environment
- Helps families during crisis
howToGetIt:
1. Call Bay Area Crisis Nursery
2. Explain your emergency situation
3. Complete intake process
4. Provide child's information
5. Drop off child during operating hours
6. Access ongoing support as needed
keywords: crisis nursery, emergency childcare, free childcare, birth to 6, family crisis, Concord, respite care, 30 days
